thread.title: Trump lawyer Cohen under criminal investigation -DOJ

title: Trump lawyer Cohen under criminal investigation -DOJ
text:
Trump lawyer Cohen under criminal investigation -DOJ Friday, April 13, 2018 - 01:54 
Michael Cohen, an attorney for U.S. President Donald Trump, has been under criminal investigation for months, federal prosecutors disclosed in a filing in Manhattan federal court in Friday. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Michael Cohen, an attorney for U.S. President Donald Trump, has been under criminal investigation for months, federal prosecutors disclosed in a filing in Manhattan federal court in Friday.
